issue.body:
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings.

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body: Not reproduced, please check the last update of our script.

issue.title: pogoda.yandex.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Включите расширение AdGuard Extra в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить скрипт `AdGuard Extra`. Для этого понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

comment.body: Прочтите первый пост, но для Yandex браузера понадобится программа.

### What product do you use?

v7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.onlinecasino321.com/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

<comment>

- Tracking subdomain: **`piwik.onlinecasino321.com`**

- Script: `https://piwik.onlinecasino321.com/matomo.js`

- Website: `https://www.onlinecasino321.com/`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I presume that trackers are *far* from the biggest problem on an online casino writingbot site; though I admit that I don't specialise in tracker stuff and that the actual AdGuard team would know more about this kind of stuff.

Have you tried turning on AdGuard Tracking Protection and EasyPrivacy in your AdGuard user settings, to see if that blocks the tracker correctly?

issue.title: Tracking subdomain on site: `www.onlinecasino321.com`
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

v7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.onlinecasino321.com/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

<comment>

- Tracking subdomain: **`piwik.onlinecasino321.com`**

- Script: `https://piwik.onlinecasino321.com/matomo.js`

- Website: `https://www.onlinecasino321.com/`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> I presume that trackers are _far_ from the biggest problem on an online casino writingbot site; though I admit that I don't specialise in tracker stuff and that the actual AdGuard team would know more about this kind of stuff.
> 
> Have you tried turning on AdGuard Tracking Protection and EasyPrivacy in your AdGuard user settings, to see if that blocks the tracker correctly?

Hi @DandelionSprout!
I completely agree with you on this.
However, I would personally suggest blocking its trackers with DNS blocking, that way's useful for devices donot use cosmetic rule addons as Adguard, uBlock Origin...
Although this is a site that deals with gambling, it is really just an intermediary to point to other real gambling sites, so I did not suggest that Adguard block it by assigning it's labeled "gambling", maybe it will be useful for tracking real gambling sites.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://1337x.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F1337x.to%2F) ### Comment > The screenshots are clear. I would like to affirm on something. When I didn't have AdGuard before, this websites forced me to click on pop ups ( random clicks on the pages then pop up show up) for two times. The same goes when i wanted to search something. Now, when I have AdGuard on, it doesn't work no matter how many clicks I click on it, as if it's hung up or something. I tried right click, it works, but clicking directly doesn't. ### Screenshots

issue.title: car.ru
issue.body:
**1**. Раздражители: Самый главный раздражитель это то, что страница самопроизвольно перезагружается ~ через 2 минуты простоя: `car.ru#%#//scriptlet('prevent-setTimeout', 'car__idle')` Остальные - 1 и 2 на картинке: `car.ru##.close-button, .search-example` **2**. Социалочка: С 3-го по 6-й на картинке: `car.ru##.list-car-social-gray, .main-page__content-middle-dzen`
Screenshot: ![2021 08 17-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/129661031-8fc97db0-d815-448a-ac18-b560e37c7138.png)
**3**. Допы: 7-й, нормализация отмечаемого пункта: `car.ru#$#.form-group-checkbox__form-control { width: 1em !important; height: 1em !important; }` Открепление шапки: `car.ru#$#header { position: absolute !important; }` Сделать так, чтоб текст на кнопке-ссылке в "Телеграм" влазил: `car.ru#$#.page-top-sell__button { margin-left: 20px !important; }` [https://car.ru/news/gibdd/118608-toyota-rav4-naehala-na-koleso-ot-furyi-i-tri-raza-perevernulas-v-vozduhe/](https://href.li/?https://car.ru/news/gibdd/118608-toyota-rav4-naehala-na-koleso-ot-furyi-i-tri-raza-perevernulas-v-vozduhe/)
Система | Фильтры | Антитрекинг ---------- | ---------- | ---------- AdGuard v3.6.6 | Базовый AdGuard;   Русский | Стандарт FireFox v78.10 ESR | Счётчиков и аналитики;   Отслеживания по URL | +Блокировка WebRTC Win7SP1 | Раздражителей;   Виджетов социальных сетей

comment.body:
**1**. Раздражитель - "Добавить в избранные источники". Появляется ~ в 50% случаев - зависит от статьи или иных обстоятельств.
Screenshot: ![2022 06 27-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/176003858-ac66f3b2-aef6-4225-9034-cb9fdb921863.png)
`car.ru##.yandex-news-promo` ___________________________________________________ **2**. Помимо перезагрузки страницы со статьёй ~ через 2 мин. (твоё правило не работает), перезагружается ещё и главная через 30 мин. Обе проблемы решаются единым правилом: `car.ru#%#//scriptlet('prevent-setTimeout', 'location')` ___________________________________________________ **3**. Если в любой статье открыть картинку, то она откроется в их просмотровщике. В нём предусмотрена реклама в правой колонке, которая скрыта. Но пустое место от рекламы остаётся и занимает значительную часть экрана. Стилями там поправлять - много, проще удалить класс 'lg-with-ads'.
Screenshot: ![2022 05 13-1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17948007/176009524-35b0642a-f73f-46d0-9541-fda91c907c55.png)
`car.ru#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'lg-with-ads')` ___________________________________________________ **4**. С 4 по 7 пункт из первого сообщения так и не решено. ___________________________________________________ [https://car.ru/news/autogramota/217491-kak-vyibratsya-iz-tonuschego-avtomobilya-8-pravil/](https://href.li/?https://car.ru/news/autogramota/217491-kak-vyibratsya-iz-tonuschego-avtomobilya-8-pravil/)
Система | Фильтры | Антитрекинг ---------- | ---------- | ---------- AdGuard v4.0.181 | Базовый AdGuard         Русский | Стандарт FireFox v78.13 ESR | Счётчиков и аналитики         Отслеживания по URL | +Блокировка WebRTC Win7SP1 | Виджетов социальных сетей         Раздражителей | +Удаление параметров отслеживания

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
